name: This isn't Moirai
description:
READ FIRST:

This is more a trial run to familiarize myself with the Bitsy engine, and also an experiment to see if I can translate an article I wrote on a game called Moirai into...well, a game. Here's the original article.

Controls: The arrow buttons. You can interact with certain icons by pushing against them. 

Moirai was brilliant, but had been taken down by its creator due to trolls and other issues. Through my game, I wanted to elaborate why Moirai was so compelling, while explaining its gameplay to folks who may not have experienced the original title before. My game isn't a duplicate of Moirai, of course, but...hopefully this captures a little of the game's spirit.
